testcase.name: TC_01_user can not update with invalid email address
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to login page...............................................passed And user provide valid username "ahmetbeyusername"..........................passed And user provide valid password "Ahmet2020."................................passed And user click sign in button...............................................passed Given user click to account menu............................................passed And user click to user info.................................................passed And user send "abcdefghgmail.com" into the email box........................passed And user click save button..................................................passed Then user assert that user account can not update with invalid email address.passed

testcase.name: TC_02_There should not be an option of any other language other than English or Turkish
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to login page...............................................passed And user provide valid username "ahmetbeyusername"..........................passed And user provide valid password "Ahmet2020."................................passed And user click sign in button...............................................passed Given user click to account menu............................................passed And user click to user info.................................................passed And user give an option language dropdown...................................passed Then user assert that there is no option other than English and Turkish.....passed
